entry.title: Demoralizing a Nation
entry.content:

  • Demoralization
  • Destabilization

He claims these tactics were massively successful in terms of demoralization as of 1985 in the U.S. and I believe him. The original interview is here:

Not only is America well beyond the demoralization stage, it‚Äôs in the middle of the crisis stage. Civil war is here and like many during Covid shutdowns, the soldiers are working from home.

Foundation on a swamp

If everyone is equal, why does it matter to have diversity? And if that doesn‚Äôt matter, why would there be any need for inclusion?

In this topsy turvy world, the Boston Marathon bomber would be able to vote equally among the rule abiding, productive members of society. You can spot these idealogues through their use of pitting their identity against ‚Äúbigots.‚Äù Anyone who disagrees with their platform, also disagrees with their identity and they are automatically a bigot that you can justify violence against.

If you believe this lie of D.I.E., you are a sheep who needs to be told what to think, how to think, when to think. VOTE BLUE NO MATTER WHO, PEASANT!

The 4 stages
